website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for cooler weather or cold water, this swimsuit is designed to provide warmth. Takes the edge off of off-season swim practice.
pros: Reduces discomfort caused by cold water or chilly weather
Quality construction is chlorine- and salt-resistant
Highly elastic with four-way stretch and shape memory
cons: A few reports of colors fading after washing

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing boys swimsuit. My son is in swim class and traditional swim suits were stiff and hard to move around and get up on the edge of the pool in. He got compliments from his swim teacherthe first day he wore this to class! Great material great quality great price. I can’t say enough good things about this buy
customer_reviews.author: Alison AJsMoM

customer_reviews.title: But these fit him perfectly and he looked good in them and felt good in them
customer_reviews.text: Was leary of it as my child is not fat or thin but he is stocky built. But these fit him perfectly and he looked good in them and felt good in them. He wore them to the beach he prefers a shirt so this set was perfect. I was so glad they fit right!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect suit
customer_reviews.text: This suit fits my son just fine. I like the material and just what he needed for end of fall swim classes. He's 8 and 65 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE...Changes color and fades from first use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought navy and orange set for 10 year old grandson to use on trip, he wore them 4 times. First time the color changed from navy with orange accents to mottled gray with dull pink accents, just got more faded each time. Grandson was embarassed. Seat of pants scuffed right away and looks worn, pant stitching is breaking. Wouldn’t buy again and would not recommend. Wasted money. Should be able to give ZERO stars!
customer_reviews.author: ray55125

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I received a swimsuit today and I was surprised the material was so soft and comfortable, very elasticity .Also have a swimming cap and put on a special heart.
customer_reviews.author: Selia

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for less drag
customer_reviews.text: I needed a rashguard suit that was a little more form fitting. This way, my son wouldn't be weighed down with extra drag like other swim trunks we have for swim lessons. I had another one of these suits picked out in case these didn't work and I'm so glad they did. They fit my son great and are stretchy enough but without all the extra drag.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swim suit for my son and its a perfect fit. fabric quality is superb, it's pretty comfortable.Initally I was thinking to buy other one with lower price but then I decided to go with this one and it didn't disappoint me . I feel completely satisfied with this swimsuit and my son is very happy with it. I ordered a bigger size so that he can use it for longer . Plus thing is that it comes with a cap as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alpi Jain

customer_reviews.title: The size is a bit off
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this swim wear is excellent. I bought 4 sizes bigger than my son’s age. The top is little longer but otherwise it fits perfectly. The bottom didn’t stay on his waist becoz of the larger size. He wears his top part with a different swim shorts and will use the bottom maybe a couple of years later. My son is average sized body.
customer_reviews.author: FourS

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t look like spandex! :)
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and I ordered the size my son normally wears. Shorts are snug enough not to chafe and loose enough not to look like a Speedo / spandex. They also stay put when wet and he isn’t tanking them up or down and not adjusting himself! Mom win! My son is 100% thrilled with these!!
customer_reviews.author: A hard to please Momma

customer_reviews.title: Gift For my Nephew
customer_reviews.text: Bought this gift for my little nephew and even though the bathing suit did run a little large on him (he's really skinny), he absolutely loved it! He was very excited to see it when they arrived and he immediately wanted to try it on and go swimming. This gift was a complete success!
customer_reviews.author: A.C. Frye

customer_reviews.title: it's very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit fits my son very well, it is of very good quality, my son feels very fresh and comfortable in it, you can also wash it very easily since you can put it in the washing machine and it remains intact
customer_reviews.author: V.F

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit but cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and my son loved it. The fit was perfect and the colors are bright. The colors have faded a bit after several washes which didn’t bother me too much, but the most disappointing thing is that the bottoms ripped easily after only a month.
customer_reviews.author: C. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for our 6 year old grandson. He is allergic to traditional swim suits. This whole set is rash guard (top and bottoms) he just loves it and had absolutely on negative reaction
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and soft! Sizing is odd
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great bathing suit set, although the sizing is kind of odd. Even though I used the sizing chart, this suit is a still a bit too big. But my son loves it, it’s soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MRR

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the quality
customer_reviews.text: This 2 piece set of rash guard and bottoms for kids was pretty nice. I was surprised that the quality was very good given the price we paid for it (under $20 for the set). We had to return the set because it was too big, otherwise we would have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Azulciel

customer_reviews.title: too small and too tight
customer_reviews.text: They are just way too small, particularly the shorts. They hug your thighs and come up high. We kept it as a backup option for my ten year old, plus he likes the shirt... but this wasn't what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: djveed

customer_reviews.title: Nice suit.
customer_reviews.text: My son's loves these. They fit well. They aren't bulky. We definitely have to use the tie string in the bottoms to keep them up though
customer_reviews.author: JGREFFIN

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good but the measurements are not very complicated and nobody can know in cm which size to choose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my son at 10 years old, for medium size, seems a good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: comfortable for kids
customer_reviews.text: I really like it product for comfort and softness, we had troubles with few usual boys swimming trunks, as they irritated the skin badly. With this one my son can play in pool, in the sand and no problem at all. And it gives good sun protection as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too pleased
customer_reviews.text: Was upset that the string to hold up my son over large bottoms came completely out so I had to go buy him more swimming trunks 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Sherica LaNaye

customer_reviews.title: Great swim suit!
customer_reviews.text: Great swimsuit! My son loves it! Fits a bit snug. The quality is good and doesn’t appear to be cheap. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 10 for my 6 year old son, and it perfectly fits.
customer_reviews.author: Bala

customer_reviews.title: runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: runs some what small, for the price the material is really nice, quality is good and machine washable, my kid loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and the shorts are a good length!
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes that the shorts are a good length and doesn’t ride up his crotch area. The material dries really fast!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: purchased for my 11 yr old grandson
customer_reviews.text: Its a good thing my grandson is small for his age. This swim suit set fit him like a spandex leotard and he is the smallest child in his grade.
customer_reviews.author: the happy homemaker

customer_reviews.title: Color Faded
customer_reviews.text: They fit well sourced their purpose, comfortable cute. Did fade in pool water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rash guard
customer_reviews.text: Great rash guard, my boy loves them very comfortable would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN K LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this bathing suit. It was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got this for my son for swimming class he loves it and it fits very well. will order again
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT BUY
customer_reviews.text: My son wears it for camp and i wash and dry it every day. Its been about 3 weeks and it is still great quality. Slightly faded after being washed daily for 3 weeks but still pretty orange. Its awesome and the swim cap is not too tight and actually keeps some water out my son reported.
customer_reviews.author: Atallen8608

customer_reviews.title: Color goes away.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these swimsuits( 2 of them) for my sons. Eventually, the color faded away.
customer_reviews.author: Akmal

customer_reviews.title: Best swim suit for kids
customer_reviews.text: I order this for my son he is very picky about swim suit but he love this one very nice fabric which not get ruin even u use gym area dryer so so good
customer_reviews.author: Mariam shah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good texture on the touch. No strange chemical smells when it first came out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Fitting is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My son liked the swim suit. Its good and good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Pooja Garg

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 9 year old great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and stayed in shape after a full day on the river.
customer_reviews.author: Clan Jukes

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: This swim wear is perfect! It is comfortable and the right size for my 8 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie R.

customer_reviews.title: TOO small!
customer_reviews.text: Buy size 14 for my 9 year old kid, not fit at all. Too small!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked it at first though it was little tight for my 8 and half year old but very soon it started wearing off. Now i will have to order another swimming suit for him. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rajeev

customer_reviews.title: Cool suit
customer_reviews.text: This suit is true to the size it is a cool suit.
customer_reviews.author: trini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This swim suit fits so nicely & and looks great too! Ordered size by weight.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Rash free and easy comfort..
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item.. total rash free.. my son is 7 but I ordered size 8-9 and it fits perfectly. the material is a bit slimy but works for me..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit comes just as it looks on the website and my grandson loves this it.
customer_reviews.author: RENAE CARTLEDGE

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good. My son loves it very much
customer_reviews.author: dongyonghua

customer_reviews.title: Order  2 sizes up.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I ordered size 14 for my 9 yr old. (He usually wears medium to large) It fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Was delivered on time..
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy, fit as expected, nice colors perfect fit on my son, thanks guys good work..
customer_reviews.author: ALBERTO

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this swim suit, It is true to size and fit him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Jones

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Our kiddo love his new swimsuit. Perfect for swim class and our trip to Hawaii
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Burk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect swim suit for my kid. He is 7 and half.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect swim suit for my kid. He is 7 and half. He is enjoying a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Alam

customer_reviews.title: Quality Fabric
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very fine. It fits nicely. Get dry very soon. Will recommend for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Biman Das

customer_reviews.title: ... fits perfectly for my 6yr old but it looks like it won't be able to next year
customer_reviews.text: The size fits perfectly for my 6yr old but it looks like it won't be able to next year.
customer_reviews.author: Tanesha

customer_reviews.title: Great material, great price
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly and the material is great. Highly recommended especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Not a pleasant buying!
customer_reviews.text: Received the swimsuit in different sizes. The top is for 130 cm and the bottom is for 140 cm.
customer_reviews.author: Qiaolin Huang

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. My nephew loves it. I love the quality. I'm going to buy the other color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Glennette Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality this swimsuit are great for my son of 7 years old, the colors are beautiful, I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Labevy

customer_reviews.title: Fits like expected
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect bathing suit for my grandson. Good Sun protection and dries Fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kids Boys Swimsuits UPF50+UV Swimwear Set Two Piece Rash Guard with hat for 4-12 Years
feature_bullets: Functional fabric: An environmentally friendly material consisting of 80% polyamide and 20% elastic fiber. The swimsuit forms a warm layer effect, which can alleviate the discomfort of the child when the child enters the water, and can protect the child from the cold when coming out of the water.

The second layer of skin: the swimsuit is like the second layer of skin, which can reduce the impact on the skin when entering the water, and can protect the body from being scratched by rocks, debris and the like in the water.
DURABLE AND FLEXIBLE: Highly chlorine and salt resistant fabric, low water retention and extremely quick drying. Four-way stretch and shape memory. Highly elastic fabric for a comfortable fit.

EXCELLENT SUN PROTECTION: Boy Sun protective swimsuit fabrics are rated UPF 50+ and provide maximum UV sun protection by blocking 98% of UVA + UVB sun rays, wet or dry。The swimsuit covers the main part of the body to prevent sunburn from the skin caused by excessive outdoor sports or water sports.
